modShortDescription: This simple modlet will give you clean water when you right click at it with murky water.
modDescription:
This simple modlet will give you clean [water](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-drinks/) when you right click at it with murky water.

## Changelog

* Removed getting clean water with empty jar, some people thought it was op.
* You will now need a schematic to craft it, and raised ingredient amounts and added some more ingredients, to craft it.
* Also changed the amount of activated charcoal that is crafted from 10 to 3.

Also want to thank Valmar for his working sinks as that is where this idea was born.

**[Download](https://github.com/wtk34Mods/wtk34_water_filter/archive/master.zip)**

**Credits:** [wtk34](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/wtk34/), Valmar
